name: UptimeRobot Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 UptimeRobot Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume UptimeRobot API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume UptimeRobot API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: account

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a public status page
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a public status page
Get (值: get) - Get a public status page
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many public status pages

friendlyName.name: friendlyName
friendlyName.description: The friendly name of the status page
friendlyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Friendly Name | 作用: The friendly name of the status page | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.description: The type of the maintenance window
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: The type of the maintenance window | (必填项)

url.name: url
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: The URL/IP of the monitor | (必填项)

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the public status page
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: ID | 作用: The ID of the public status page | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: psps (值: None) - Public status pages IDs separated with dash, e.g. 236-1782-4790

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: custom_domain (值: None) - The domain or subdomain that the status page will run on
friendly_name (值: None) - The friendly name of the status page
monitors (值: None) - Monitor IDs to be displayed in status page (the values are separated with a dash (-) or 0 for all monitors)
password (值: None) - The password for the status page
sort (值: None) - The sorting of the status page

value.name: value
value.description: The correspondent value for the alert contact type
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: The correspondent value for the alert contact type | (必填项)

duration.name: duration
duration.natural_language_description: 参数名: Duration (Minutes) | 作用: The maintenance window activation period (minutes) | (必填项)

monthDay.name: monthDay
monthDay.natural_language_description: 参数名: Month Day | 默认值: 1

start_time.name: start_time
start_time.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Time | 作用: The maintenance window start datetime | (必填项)

monitors.name: monitors
monitors.description: Monitor IDs to be displayed in status page (the values are separated with a dash (-) or 0 for all monitors)
monitors.natural_language_description: 参数名: Monitor IDs | 作用: Monitor IDs to be displayed in status page (the values are separated with a dash (-) or 0 for all monitors) | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: custom_domain (值: None) - The domain or subdomain that the status page will run on
password (值: None) - The password for the status page
sort (值: None) - The sorting of the status page
